name: Zombie Simulator
description:
We are zombie hordes. We are oppressed by mankind for long time. Hundreds of millions of our compatriots were got shot in the head and dismembered in games. We're gonna fight back now. We will smash all the things!

Crowd: Zombie Hordes behave like real crowds


Spread: Control hundreds of swarming zombies, climbing on top of each other to reach higher levels


Killing: rolls forward to spread and conquer


Destruction: Smash all the things!


Are you really ready for the zombie apocalypse?

My other games:
